title: Can't redeem Hoyts Arcade Corki Skin
body:
I am unable to validate my Hoyts code for Arcade Corki as I keep receiving the 'session expired' screen. Is there a way around this?  I have a timer for the skin which expires 9/11/2017 at 11:59. 

Any assistance would be appreciated.

replies.body: Did you recieve your code through email? The hoyts I went to had signs that said to send support an email along with my ticket's photo and the response I got is I should receive a code in my email but I bought my ticket on october 28 and still got nothing. Really want to know how other people redeemed their arcade corki.
